result.arabic_text: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
result.translation: Ibilisi yarireguye ku Mana Allah n’ubwishime n’akantu ati: “Sinshobora kwubamira umuntu Waremye mw’ivu ryumye rikumagana nk’ikinonko, ryahinduye ibara rikirabura, rigahindura n’akamoto”.
